Design - Subjects randomly assign two group ( EEG biofeedback /psychotherapy placebo ) block randomization . - EEG biofeedback training provide 5 week ( 10 session , twice per week ) . Each training session compose 6 four minute trial follow 5 thirty second rest period - Psychotherapy placebo session provide 5 week . These session consist additional assessment , interpretation test result provide information course treatment mood disorder . - After subject complete training , participate month-long ( twice per week ) self-training session maintain similar mental state neurofeedback training session without feedback system 's assistance . - Subjects finish psychotherapy placebo refer therapist necessary .
